mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction (account_id, amount, currency, direction, description, balance_after_transaction) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{amount}, #{currency}::currency_enum, #{direction}::transaction_direction_enum, #{description}, #{balanceAfterTransaction})
mapper.select: SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, currency, direction, description, balance_after_transaction, created_at FROM transaction WHERE account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
